full_summary:
### RFP: Diversity and Inclusion Professional for DFO Pacific Region

#### Tender Number: PW-22-01008612
#### Amendment Number: 8
#### Solicitation Number: 30002762A

##### Tender Overview
Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) Pacific Region invites experienced professionals to submit a proposal to provide Diversity and Inclusion expertise to support the organization's Diversity Inclusion Action Team (DIAT) and Regional senior management. The selected expert(s) will develop a strategic plan to enhance the overall workplace culture and promote employee diversity.

#### Contract Details
- **Contract Period**: From contract award to March 31st, 2023 (inclusive).
- **Region of Performance**: British Columbia.

#### Key Responsibilities
The Diversity and Inclusion expert(s) will:
- Develop a strategic plan to enhance workplace culture and promote employee diversity.
- Conduct an environmental scan to engage staff and gather inputs.
- Create an action plan to achieve identified outcomes.
- Advise DIAT and Regional senior management on best practices.

#### Eligibility and Submission Guidelines
Eligible proponents must:
- Review all tender documents and amendments.
- Prepare a comprehensive proposal outlining methodology, approach, and qualifications.
- Ensure compliance with Canadian Free Trade Agreements and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement.

#### Submissions and Evaluation
Proposals must be submitted electronically via the Canada Buy Service (Canadabuys.canada.ca).

The evaluation criteria will assess the proposer's:
- Methodology and approach.
- Qualifications and expertise.
- Ability to meet the contract requirements.

The closing date for the submission of proposals is 15 November 2022 at 13:00 (EST).

#### Contact Information
For more information, please contact LaKing Cal at DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca.

#### Attachments
Available at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/

Attachments include the original tender notice and subsequent amendments. Attention is drawn to Addendum 1-6 for crucial information regarding the contract.   [tbc, qualify]
